Ni'Ja Whitson bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkírí, ónyé édémédé na onye guzobere / ónyé nduzi nka nke The NWA Project
Whitson bụ nwoke na nwanyị na-ekwekọghị na nwoke ma jiri nnọchiaha ha / ha.

Ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na onye édémédé, ónyé na-eme egwuregwu na ónyé edemedo, Bessie-Award-winning gender nonconforming interdisciplinary artist, Ni Tianja Whitson ka The New York Times kpọrọ ya "majestuc" na "magnetic", Brooklyn Magazine makwaara ya dị ka otu n'ime 100 omenala na-emetụta. Ihe nrite ndị na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere Hedgebrook Residency, LMCC Process Space Residency، Bogliasco Fellowship, Brooklyn Arts Exchange Artist Residency.
